title: Must Watch: Steve Peat takes Claudio to the Limit in Retro Trails
content:
Take Claudio to the Limit is a new five part series challenging World Cup Downhill legend Claudio Caluori to crazy riding-related challenges on the trails of Graubuenden, Switzerland. Steve Peat, another star of downhill, is the first to Take Claudio to the Limit. The challenge? A “race” down the exposed ridge lines of Davos aboard […]

The post Must Watch: Steve Peat takes Claudio to the Limit in Retro Trails appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
